overview: Marina Valieri,daughter of Jerome and Chariklia Kavafy, narrates her exciting journey of her life from the bourgeois salons of Europe,just before WW2, to the Lesvos island/Greece rural life of the 50's and 60's till today. A life like fairy tale where anything you are afraid appears but continue to to go onand keep being optimistic.
title: Marina Valieri, Cavafy's Grand Niece
